DatabaseApplication.​CommandConsumer
DatabaseApplication.​CommandConsumer

This class will connect to Kafka and subscribe to the COMMANDS topic to allow for IPC

Variables
Kafka Consumer Config
server

the kafka server to connect to

topic

the topic to subscribe to

config

an object containing configuration information for the Kafka connection

cancelToken

a token used to cancel a the Kafka consumer looing for new messages

source

the source of cancelToken

canceltoken
CancellationToken canceltoken
class configuration
controller

the object that instantiated this object

Active

controls the main loop

Functions
CommandConsumer
public CommandConsumer(
ThreadController controller
)

the contructor for the CommandConsumer class

parameters:

controller

the object that created this one. Needed for exicuting IPC commands

CommandThread
public void CommandThread()

the primary function of the CommandConsumer to be run as a thread

Variables
Kafka Consumer
consumer

the Kafka consumer object

topicp

the partition to subscribe to

consumerresult

the result of checking for a new message from the Kafka server

Kafka message
command

the part of the message that specifys an action to take

parameter

the part of the messag that may be passed to a function as a parameter

Functions
Kill
public void Kill()

sets Active to false in order to end the primary loop and cancels any current attempt to fetch messages from Kafka
